description: '''The Word Alive'''{{refn|group=note|name=first|Frequently misspelled as "The World Alive"<ref name="auto">{{Cite web |url=https://www.rocksound.tv/news/read/the-world-alive-bassist-daniel-shapiro-has-left-the-band |title=The Word Alive Bassist Daniel Shapiro Has Left The Band |last=Cross |first=Will |date=August 8, 2017}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.ticketfly.com/event/1555792-we-came-as-romans-escape-eugene/|title=We Came As Romans w/ Escape the Fate, The World Alive – Tickets – Hi-Fi Music Hall – Eugene, OR – September 28th, 2017|website=Ticketfly|access-date=May 25, 2018}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=http://newmillenniummusic.com/the-world-alive/|title=The Word Alive|website=New Millennium Music|access-date=June 26, 2019}}</ref>}} is an American [[metalcore]] band formed in [[Phoenix, Arizona|Phoenix]] in 2008. The band was signed to [[Fearless Records]] since their formation. In 2022, they changed their label and signed to Thriller Records. The band consists of vocalist [[Tyler Smith (musician)|Tyler Smith]], guitarist Jose DelRio, guitarist Logan Abernethy, and drummer Devin Attard. Their second EP, ''[[Empire (EP)|Empire]]'' reached No. 15 on the [[Top Heatseekers]], meeting a great amount of positive acclaim upon its release in 2009. In 2010, the group recorded their debut studio album, ''[[Deceiver (The Word Alive album)|Deceiver]]'' and released it on August 31, 2010. It reached No. 97 on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and No.15 on [[Independent Albums]].
